short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XHS自动回复, 小红书自动回复, XHS Auto Reply, XiaoHongShu Auto Reply, RPA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chinese version:
小红书网页版允许用户查看和回复朋友的消息。本插件支持配置关键词，通过匹配关键词来实现自动回复的功能，从而提升用户的日常生活效率。

English version:
The web version of Xiaohongshu.com allows users to view and reply to friends' messages. This plugin supports the configuration of keywords. By matching these keywords, it enables the function of automatic replies. This feature aims to enhance the efficiency of users' daily lives.
